item.title: 🦜LangChain x Google The official Google `generative-ai` repo has a ton of resources for getting started with Gemini This includes SEVEN different n...
item.description:
🦜LangChain x Google

The official Google `generative-ai` repo has a ton of resources for getting started with Gemini

This includes SEVEN different notebooks for using LangChain to orchestrate a Gemini-powered LLM app

Dive into all the goodness: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/generative-ai/tree/main/language/orchestration/langchain
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT DataStax: Learn how to build GenAI chat! 💻💬 Join us on Dec 20. We'll dive deep with @GoogleCloud's Yemi Falokun & @LangChainAI's @RLanceMarti...
item.description:
RT DataStax
Learn how to build GenAI chat! 💻💬 Join us on Dec 20.

We'll dive deep with @GoogleCloud's Yemi Falokun & @LangChainAI's @RLanceMartin to build a customer service chatbot with Vertex AI embeddings and RAG with LangChain + Astra DB vector search.

https://dtsx.io/3GLaMoP
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Nazeem: Introducing Vexa Search - Get information from a given image (like Google Images). It uses the Gemini Vision model and Llava model as fallb...
item.description:
RT Nazeem
Introducing Vexa Search - Get information from a given image (like Google Images). It uses the Gemini Vision model and Llava model as fallback. Just a fun weekend project, check it out! :)

Powered by @LangChainAI

Demo: https://vexasearch.com/

Repo: https://github.com/n4ze3m/vexasearch
item.author: LangChain

item.title: pip install langchain-nvidia-ai-endpoints
item.description:
pip install langchain-nvidia-ai-endpoints


NVIDIA AI Developer: Announcing @LangChainAI connectors for NVIDIA AI Foundation Endpoints - easily access, customize, and deploy leading models including Mixtral 8x7B, Llama 2, and Stable Diffusion for your enterprise applications.

Visit https://nvda.ws/46ZohMh site to get started.

item.title: 🦜👿Chaos Engineering The behavior of LLMs can be unpredictable and chaotic ChatChaos is a fake LLM by @andrewnguonly specifically designed to ret...
item.description:
🦜👿Chaos Engineering

The behavior of LLMs can be unpredictable and chaotic

ChatChaos is a fake LLM by @andrewnguonly specifically designed to return invalid JSON, hallucinate, and have long response times

Can be used to stress test your system!

Blog: https://medium.com/@andrewnguonly/chatchaos-the-good-the-bad-and-the-ugly-81f9612d7b00
item.author: LangChain

item.title: 🦜💬FastUI-Chat Want to get an easy frontend for your LangChain app? All written in Python? @Shroominic made an awesome example hooking up LangCha...
item.description:
🦜💬FastUI-Chat

Want to get an easy frontend for your LangChain app? All written in Python?

@Shroominic made an awesome example hooking up LangChain to FastUI (a new framework from the @pydantic team)

Check it out here: https://github.com/shroominic/fastui-chat/tree/main
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: 🦙🌋 Ollama local multimodal models 🌋🦙 You can now add local image reasoning abilities to your @LangChainAI 🦜🔗 Python an...
item.description:
RT Jacob Lee
🦙🌋 Ollama local multimodal models 🌋🦙

You can now add local image reasoning abilities to your @LangChainAI 🦜🔗 Python and JS projects via LLaVA and @OLLAMA!

Upgrading will also use their chat interface if available.

🐍: https://python.langchain.com/docs/integrations/chat/ollama
☕: https://js.langchain.com/docs/integrations/chat/ollama
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Jack Gordley: Introducing ADB Chat, an LLM chatbot built with @LangchainAI, @streamlit, and the @Android Debug Bridge to aid in Android Forensics i...
item.description:
RT Jack Gordley
Introducing ADB Chat, an LLM chatbot built with @LangchainAI, @streamlit, and the @Android Debug Bridge to aid in Android Forensics investigations. Simply plug in your Android Device and chat with files, processes, and other system info https://github.com/jgordley/chat-adb
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Jack Gordley: Excited to share my new Google Calendar assistant built with @nextjs, @FastAPI, and @MongoDB. Core logic built using @LangChainAI and...
item.description:
RT Jack Gordley
Excited to share my new Google Calendar assistant built with @nextjs, @FastAPI, and @MongoDB. Core logic built using @LangChainAI and the @OpenAI API. A lot is possible right now using LLMs and simple tool definitions, such as the GCal API specs: https://gordles.io/posts/calvin
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT MyScale: The #AI-powered #chatbot is a game-changer for the future. With #RAG empowerment, your chatbot takes competition to the next level🚀. �...
item.description:
RT MyScale
The #AI-powered #chatbot is a game-changer for the future. With #RAG empowerment, your chatbot takes competition to the next level🚀.

💡Introducing our end-to-end RAG solution, using @MyScaleDB and @LangChainAI for cutting-edge chatbot development!
👀👀https://myscale.com/blog/build-rag-enabled-chatbot/
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Roger Taylor: How @LangChainAI improved context for lyric continuation from limited seeds:✳️Retrieve most relevant chunks✳️Get full parent docs...
item.description:
RT Roger Taylor
How @LangChainAI improved context for lyric continuation from limited seeds:✳️Retrieve most relevant chunks✳️Get full parent docs for complete style/tone✳️Or, retrieve bigger chunks, more context while fitting LLM limits.
See Mahesh Deshwal walkthru: https://buff.ly/47WN6JU
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Hard Kothari: Another week and some great updates by @LangChainAI The newsletter is out and below is my short 🔑take away: LangChain v0.1 Langcha...
item.description:
RT Hard Kothari
Another week and some great updates by @LangChainAI

The newsletter is out and below is my short 🔑take away:

LangChain v0.1
Langchain is splitting its code in
- langchain: Main Congnitive Architecture
- langchain-core: Abstractions and LCEL
- langchain-community: 3rd Party… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1736765123224555687

item.description:
RT Neo4j
If you already took the "Neo4j & LLM Fundamentals" course, it's time to put all your knowledge into practice and create a Movie Recommendation Chatbot backed by a Neo4j database 😎

Check it out:
https://bit.ly/3Tpmflr

#Neo4j #Chatbot #llms #GenAI #Python @LangChainAI

item.title: RT PlugBear: PlugBear now supports LangServe (+ @LangChainAI) apps 🎉 Invite your LLM app to your Slack or Discord seamlessly with PlugBear! (You ca...
item.description:
RT PlugBear
PlugBear now supports LangServe (+ @LangChainAI) apps 🎉 Invite your LLM app to your Slack or Discord seamlessly with PlugBear! (You can do that in 5 minutes 😉)

https://plugbear.io/posts/integrate-langchain-langserve-app-with-slack-using-plugbear

#buildinpublic #langchain #langserve #plugbear

item.title: RT Sebastian Rojo: Excited to share my latest project for the @Supabase Hackathon! I've developed a unique RAG system that's voice-activated. It's des...
item.description:
RT Sebastian Rojo
Excited to share my latest project for the @Supabase Hackathon! I've developed a unique RAG system that's voice-activated. It's designed to discuss the architecture of any application using a mix of @LangChainAI , @supabase , @nextjs, @FastAPI, and @vocodehq. 🧵
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT João Moura: Stock Analysis with AI Agents, using CrewAI 🚣 Using @LangChainAI tools + LangSmith, running on @Replit A researcher, an analyst and...
item.description:
RT João Moura
Stock Analysis with AI Agents, using CrewAI 🚣
Using @LangChainAI tools + LangSmith, running on @Replit

A researcher, an analyst and an investment advisor Agents come together to built a recommendation on any stock out there ✨

lmk if you like and want more of this! 😉

item.title: RT Daniel San: Introducing @MistralAI as your copilot in VSCode! 🚀 Effortlessly integrate Mistral AI with CodeGPT to enhance your coding experience...
item.description:
RT Daniel San
Introducing @MistralAI as your copilot in VSCode! 🚀

Effortlessly integrate Mistral AI with CodeGPT to enhance your coding experience.

Try out the models:
- mistral-tiny
- mistral-small
- mistral-medium

Check the documentation here: https://docs.codegpt.co/docs/tutorial-ai-providers/mistral

Created with… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1736472963325600157

item.title: RT Vinit Agrawal: Made a video about using LangChain's (@LangChainAI) Self-Querying Query Constructor and use it in Slack's (@SlackHQ) search API. Sel...
item.description:
RT Vinit Agrawal
Made a video about using LangChain's (@LangChainAI) Self-Querying Query Constructor and use it in Slack's (@SlackHQ) search API.

Self-Querying is usually used with vector stores like @weaviate_io, but here I am using it for Slack's search.

Check it out:
https://youtu.be/DTifxo4hhzA?si=knQ87py3QGvMr2ws
item.author: LangChain
